name: app.js
description: A simple application for discovering computing fibonacci numbers

scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] browser/js/main.js | uglifyjs -o public/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] browser/js/main.js -o public/js/bundle.js -dv

author: David Harting
